(Rev. December 2012)
Department of the Treasury  
Internal Revenue Service 
U.S. Information Return for Beneficiaries of  
Certain Canadian Registered Retirement Plans 
a
 
Information about Form 8891 and its instructions is at 
www.irs.gov/form8891.

Attach to Form 1040.

Have you previously made an election under Article XVIII(7) of the U.S.-Canada income tax treaty to 
defer U.S. income tax on the undistributed earnings of the plan? 
...........
 
a
Yes
No
b 
If “Yes,” enter the first year the election came into effect 
 and go to line 7a. If “No,” go to line 6c.
c 
If you have not previously made the election described on line 6a above, you can make an irrevocable 
election for this year and subsequent years by checking this box 
...........
 
a

Plan balance at the end of the year. If you checked the “Annuitant” box on line 5, the “Yes” box 
on line 6a, or the box on line 6c, 
stop here. Do not 
complete the rest of the form
